message: Watch the video, Apple vs PC, Surface Pro 3 version (by Yahoo)
name: Smart, Versatile Surface Pro 3 Can Do It All — Maybe Even Lift the Windows 8 Curse
caption: www.yahoo.com
description: Yes, here is Microsoft again, with a third version of its Surface Pro; The Surface concept is either brilliant or doomed: It’s a tablet and a laptop in one. When it’s a tablet, it’s something like an iPad. It can run the 4 million Windows programs — full-blown software like Photoshop, Quicken, iTune…
